summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffery Edwards and Jes Staley discussing financial matters, including losses in equity and personal plans. The conversation touches on the reputation impact of a deal and personal updates, such as moving into a new office. The document reflects informal communication between associates in a financial context.

persons.name: Jeffery Edwards
persons.context: Jeffery Edwards is involved in a conversation regarding financial losses and personal updates, indicating a connection to Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is engaged in a discussion about financial matters and personal visits, indicating a close professional relationship with Jeffery Edwards.

connections.description: Jeffery Edwards and Jes Staley are communicating about personal and financial matters, indicating a friendly and professional relationship.

keyFacts: Jeffery Edwards mentions a loss of $5 billion in equity due to write-downs and operational losses.
Jes Staley expresses interest in visiting Jeffery Edwards in Miami.
Jeffery Edwards has moved into a new office with a view of the Empire State Building and Chrysler Building.
The correspondence includes a disclaimer about the confidentiality of the information shared.
